document.full_text: bill haas took advantage of familiar surroundings to fire a flawless eight-under-par 64 for a two-stroke lead after the first round of the quail hollow championship on thursday.
document.title: bill haas tames quail hollow for two-stroke lead
lines_and_colors: bill haas took advantage of familiar surroundings to fire a flawless eight-under-par 64 for a two-stroke lead after the first round of the quail hollow championship on thursday.
